title: Pandu Geddon
author: Pandu Geddon
content: Yesterday, I received a notification from Telegram regarding my data being used to register for a bounty campaign by someone else's account.I don't think that's a problem for now. but if in the future someone tricked me by sending shitcoin or BNB with a small amount to my address, maybe this could be a problem in the future.account Lavely92, previously published cheater by @Kathleenn. and get the tag from @CryptopreneurBrainboss.Quote from: Lavely92 on July 24, 2022, 02:49:18 AM#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONbc1q9anjk567t444xmff0ugzjfvfrr4005c3fv05rcForum Username: Pandu GeddonForum Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3416506Telegram User name: @kathleennParticipated Campaigns:  ArticleBEP-20 Wallet Address: 0x6b937de73cBEB3FCDdF07AD49b6306dd132Dae3e        https://ninjastic.space/post/60619515Quote from: Lavely92 on July 24, 2022, 02:50:47 AM#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONbc1q9anjk567t444xmff0ugzjfvfrr4005c3fv05rcForum Username: Pandu GeddonForum Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3416506Telegram User name: @kathleennParticipated Campaigns:  ArticleBEP-20 Wallet Address: 0x6b937de73cBEB3FCDdF07AD49b6306dd132Dae3ehttps://ninjastic.space/post/60619522Quote from: Lavely92 on July 24, 2022, 02:55:13 AM#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONbc1q9anjk567t444xmff0ugzjfvfrr4005c3fv05rcForum Username: Pandu GeddonForum Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3416506Telegram User name: @kathleennParticipated Campaigns:  ArticleBEP-20 Wallet Address: 0x6b937de73cBEB3FCDdF07AD49b6306dd132Dae3ehttps://ninjastic.space/post/60619535Lavely92 using my username, BTC address, and BSC address.I don't know why he did it. but he made 2 POA at once in the same campaign. and I'm also not the one who publicized the fraud he did. I don't know if there's any other motive he's referring to.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: Pandu Geddon on July 25, 2022, 12:17:18 PMI don't know why he did it. but he made 2 POA at once in the same campaign. and I'm also not the one who publicized the fraud he did. I don't know if there's any other motive he's referring to.I can only assume that you  and  the actual owner of the telegram account @kathleenn user, Kathleenn, caught him on an alternate account. I found that Kathleenn caught him once, for which the manager marked his two accounts.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2544574.msg59495088#msg59495088After that, he began to subscribe with a telegram account@kathleenn. You likely also stepped on the tail of his farming accounts.Quote from: Kathleenn on March 13, 2022, 05:10:17 PMTelegram User name: @kathleenn

comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: Quote from: lovesmayfamilis on July 25, 2022, 01:01:25 PMYou likely also stepped on the tail of his farming accounts.oh my god, you are right. it turns out that the account is indeed connected to my other catches. Now I understand why he did all this.https://bscscan.com/address/0x6b59ba33714d80a9dc3ea0fdd8b70e0755a381fd#tokentxnsQuote0xFf6C79F49cdEa8c4A38ABcF225A63E6bcbaE2596 :  Easin52850x34Bc8bfA00Aa608dD345ecfEabf166674dda2501 :Tasfiya92746 + Easin5285@Tasfiya92746 account, I published with 2 other accounts that were caught by cheaters. Quote from: Pandu Geddon on July 17, 2022, 06:55:04 AMAccounts Connected: (Note: Banned shown in red / Inactive in Blue)ONITA5285ARAFAT5285Tasfiya92746
